00019 /********************************************************
00020         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00021 
00022         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00023  ********************************************************/
00024 
00025 class tt_svf:public tt_audio_base{
00026 
00027         private:
00028                 // Function pointer for the DSP Loop (use this instead of branching for speed)
00029                 typedef void (tt_svf::*FuncPtr)(tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *);
00030                 FuncPtr dsp_executor;
00031 
00032                 // Attributes Values & Variables
00033                 tt_attribute_value                      resonance;
00034                 tt_attribute_value                      frequency;
00035                 tt_attribute_value_discrete     mode;
00036                 double                                          freq, res, damp;
00037                 double                                          lowpass_output;
00038                 double                                          highpass_output;
00039                 double                                          bandpass_output;
00040                 double                                          notch_output;
00041                 double                                          peak_output;
00042         
00043         
00044         public:
00045                 enum selectors{                                                         
00046                         num_poles = 2,
00047                         
00048                         k_mode,                                                 // Attribute Selectors
00049                         k_mode_lowpass,
00050                         k_mode_highpass,
00051                         k_mode_bandpass,
00052                         k_mode_notch,
00053                         k_mode_peak,
00054                         k_frequency,
00055                         k_resonance
00056                 };
00057                 
00058 
00059                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00060                 tt_svf()                                                                // Constructor          
00061                 {
00062                         set_attr(k_frequency, 1000.0);  
00063                         set_attr(k_resonance, 1.0);
00064                         set_attr(k_mode, k_mode_lowpass);       
00065                         clear();
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 ~tt_svf()                                                               // Destructor
00069                 {
00070                         ;
00071                 }
00072 
00073 
00074                 // ATTRIBUTES
00075                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00076                 {
00077                         double temp1, temp2;
00078                         
00079                         switch (sel){
00080                                 case k_frequency:
00081                                         frequency = clip(val, float(20.0), float(sr * 0.5));
00082                                         freq = 2.0 * sin(pi * val / double(sr * 2)); 
00083                                         if (freq > 0.25)
00084                                                 freq = 0.25;
00085                                         break;
00086                                 case k_resonance:
00087                                         resonance = val;
00088                                         res = val * 0.1;
00089                                         break;
00090                                 case k_mode:
00091                                         mode = tt_attribute_value_discrete(val);
00092                                         if(mode == k_mode_lowpass)
00093                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_svf::dsp_vector_calc_lowpass;
00094                                         else if(mode == k_mode_highpass)
00095                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_svf::dsp_vector_calc_highpass;
00096                                         else if(mode == k_mode_bandpass)
00097                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_svf::dsp_vector_calc_bandpass;
00098                                         else if(mode == k_mode_notch)
00099                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_svf::dsp_vector_calc_notch;
00100                                         else if(mode == k_mode_peak)
00101                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_svf::dsp_vector_calc_peak;
00102                                         break;
00103                         }
00104                         temp1 = limit_max(2.0 / freq - freq * 0.5, 2.0);
00105                         //if(2.0 < temp1) 
00106                         //      temp1 = 2.0;
00107 
00108                         temp2 = 2.0 * (1.0 - pow(res, 0.25));
00109 
00110                         if(temp1 < temp2)
00111                                 damp = temp1;
00112                         else
00113                                 damp = temp2;
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00117                 {
00118                         switch (sel){
00119                                 case k_frequency:
00120                                         return frequency;
00121                                 case k_resonance:
00122                                         return resonance;
00123                                 case k_mode:
00124                                         return mode;
00125                                 default:
00126                                         return 0.0;
00127                         }
00128                 }
00129                 
00130 
00131                 // clear
00132                 void clear()
00133                 {
00134                         lowpass_output = 0;
00135                         highpass_output = 0;
00136                         bandpass_output = 0;
00137                         notch_output = 0;
00138                         peak_output = 0;
00139                 }
00140                 
00141                 
00142                 /*****************************************************
00143                  * DSP LOOPS
00144                  *****************************************************/
00145                 
00146                 // Publically exposed interface for this object's dsp routine
00147                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00148                 {
00149                         (*this.*dsp_executor)(in, out); // Run the function pointed to by our function pointer
00150                 }
00151         
00152         private:
00153                 // DSP LOOP: LOWPASS
00154                 void dsp_vector_calc_lowpass(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00155                 {
00156                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00157                         while(temp_vs--){
00158                                 filter_tick(*in->vector++);
00159                                 *out->vector++ = 0.5 * lowpass_output;
00160                         }
00161                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00162                 }
00163 
00164                 // DSP LOOP: HIGHPASS
00165                 void dsp_vector_calc_highpass(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00166                 {
00167                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00168                         while(temp_vs--){
00169                                 filter_tick(*in->vector++);
00170                                 *out->vector++ = 0.5 * highpass_output;
00171                         }
00172                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00173                 }
00174 
00175                 // DSP LOOP: BANDPASS
00176                 void dsp_vector_calc_bandpass(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00177                 {
00178                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00179                         while(temp_vs--){
00180                                 filter_tick(*in->vector++);
00181                                 *out->vector++ = 0.5 * bandpass_output;
00182                         }
00183                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00184                 }
00185 
00186                 // DSP LOOP: NOTCH
00187                 void dsp_vector_calc_notch(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00188                 {
00189                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00190                         while(temp_vs--){
00191                                 filter_tick(*in->vector++);
00192                                 *out->vector++ = 0.5 * notch_output;
00193                         }
00194                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00195                 }
00196 
00197                 // DSP LOOP: PEAK
00198                 void dsp_vector_calc_peak(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00199                 {
00200                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00201                         while(temp_vs--){
00202                                 filter_tick(*in->vector++);
00203                                 *out->vector++ = 0.5 * (lowpass_output - highpass_output);
00204                         }
00205                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00206                 }
00207                 
00208                 
00209                 // THE GUTS OF THE SVF FILTER
00210                 void filter_tick(tt_sample_value value)
00211                 {
00212 //                      short i;
00213                         
00214 /*                      for(i=0; i < 2; i++){   // 2X Oversampling
00215                                 notch_output = value - damp * bandpass_output;
00216                                 lowpass_output += freq * bandpass_output;
00217                                 highpass_output = notch_output - lowpass_output;
00218                                 bandpass_output = freq * highpass_output + bandpass_output;
00219                         }                       
00220 */
00221                         // UNROLLED FOR LOOP FOR SPEED
00222                         notch_output = anti_denormal(value - damp * bandpass_output);
00223                         lowpass_output += anti_denormal(freq * bandpass_output);
00224                         highpass_output = anti_denormal(notch_output - lowpass_output);
00225                         bandpass_output = anti_denormal(freq * highpass_output + bandpass_output);
00226                 
00227                         notch_output = anti_denormal(value - damp * bandpass_output);
00228                         lowpass_output += anti_denormal(freq * bandpass_output);
00229                         highpass_output = anti_denormal(notch_output - lowpass_output);
00230                         bandpass_output = anti_denormal(freq * highpass_output + bandpass_output);
00231                 }       
00232                 
00233 /*              void dsp_vector_calc(sample_vector in, short vector_size, sample_vector out)
00234                 {

00236                         short i;
00237                         
00238                         while(vector_size--){
00239                                 value = *in++;
00240                                 for(i=0; i < 2; i++){   // 2X Oversampling
00241                                         notch_output = value - damp * bandpass_output;
00242                                         lowpass_output += freq * bandpass_output;
00243                                         highpass_output = notch_output - lowpass_output;
00244                                         bandpass_output = freq * highpass_output + bandpass_output;
00245                                         switch (mode) {
00246                                                 case k_mode_lowpass:
00247                                                         temp = 0.5 * lowpass_output;
00248                                                         break;          
00249                                                 case k_mode_highpass:
00250                                                         temp = 0.5 * highpass_output;
00251                                                         break;          
00252                                                 case k_mode_bandpass:   
00253                                                         temp = 0.5 * bandpass_output;
00254                                                         break;          
00255                                                 case k_mode_notch:                      
00256                                                         temp = 0.5 * notch_output;
00257                                                         break;

00260                                                         break;          
00261                                         }
00262                                 }

00267 
00268 };
